author: missirol
body:
This PR includes updates to the handling of the log files of the `addOnTests`, in order to cope with the changes in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40018.

This PR is required by https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40018, and it shouldn't be merged if https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40018 won't be.
title: cope with improved logging of `addOnTests`
